name: Snatcher!
description:
Granny needs you to Snatch her some items! You should help her with that, before she gets real real mad!

Snatcher! is an infinite runner with brain trainer elements, designed to make you want to improve your highscore again and again.

When you arrive at the supermarket, you will recieve a list of items, which you have to collect from the store.

Everytime you finish your list and pass checkout, you get a new one, granny never has enough!

Dodge the obstacles and improve your high score!
